name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Nancy M. FEATHERS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Nancy M. FEATHERS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
GRANTED 0003WDAPL96.
AND NOW, this 1st day of February, 1996, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted, limited to the issue of whether a post-verdict judgment of acquittal, entered by the trial court, is appealable by the Commonwealth. This case is to be scheduled for oral argument.

casebody.head_matter:
672 A.2d 279
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Nancy M. FEATHERS, Petitioner.
No. 0357 W.D. Allocatur Docket 1995.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 1, 1996.
